title: UK Higher Education Learning Technology Advancement Strategy: Blended Research and Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A customized learning design competency enhancement program for pre-service and in-service teachers, focusing on flexible learning design and technology integration strategies in limited-technology environments (smartphone-centric)

learning_goals: Analyzing the development of TEL (Technology-Enhanced Learning) in UK higher education can explain learning technology strategies for the post-pandemic era
Can establish an educational effectiveness evaluation plan using mixed research methodologies (integrating quantitative/qualitative data)
Can apply principles of designing mobile-based microlearning content in resource-constrained technological environments to practical settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
